records.QueryText: farmer want about pashudhan sanjeevni toll free number ??
records.KccAns: Livestock Sanjeevani Helpline Toll Free Number '' 1962 '' - State level call center has been set up by providing livestock sanjivani helpline toll free number 1962 to provide veterinary and artificial insemination facility by reaching home to the state's cattle feeders. Diseases of animals have been be linked to the Livestock Base Registration Scheme, so that all the information of the animal can be received by the call center as soon as the Animal Base Number is provided.
